title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 358 - Calculation Of Disability Retirement Benefits For Restored Service Retirees Under Retirement And Social Security Law Articles 11, 14, And 15
content:

§ 358.2 - Final average salary
§ 358.3 - No reduction on account of service retirement benefits received

Notes

R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 358

Statutory authority: Retirement and Social Security Law, sections 11, 101, 311, 519, 614

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
